select s.id as id,s.created_at as createdAt,s.created_by as createdBy, s.updated_by as updatedBy,s.updated_at as updatedAt,s.status as status, s.moment_id as momentId, u.user_name as userName, u.avatar as avatar, tc.img_url as imgUrl,tc.name as courseName, from t_collect s left join t_user u on u.id = s.created_by left join t_course tc on s.moment_id = tc.id where s.is_delete = 0
and s.created_by = #{createdBy}
select ifnull(count(1),0) from t_collect where is_delete = 0 and moment_id = #{momentId}
select ifnull(count(1),0) from t_collect where is_delete = 0 and created_by = #{userId}

select s.id as id,s.created_at as createdAt,s.created_by as createdBy, s.updated_by as updatedBy,s.updated_at as updatedAt,s.status as status, s.moment_id as momentId, g.id as goodsId,g.img_url as imgUrl,g.goods_name as goodsName from t_collect s left join t_goods g on s.moment_id = g.id where s.is_delete = 0 and s.created_by = #{userId}
